sub_title: Research & Insights | Research Operations Management | Research/Survey Methodology | PhD
summary:
Skilled in research design, planning, analysis, and reporting, I translate client problems into research questions and then insight. I manage client relations and research operations across diverse cultures from Europe to South America. I recruit, train, coach, and manage fieldworkers.

With a PhD in research methodology and degrees in business statistics and sociology, I specialise in research design for quantitative and qualitative studies. I create, script, and manage surveys for various modes of data collection and deliver in-depth qualitative programmes with hard to reach respondents. 

Significant experience working in market research agencies and collaborating with other research vendors. 

KEY ACHIEVEMENTS	
• Part of a team managing the Generation and Gender Survey - the world’s largest and most prominent demographics research. Personally managed research operations and client relations in 6 countries.
• Collaborated globally to achieve a mostly standardized approach with clients across 18 countries.
• Delivered strategic insights to clients in health, construction, FMCG, government, and non-profit sectors.
• Developed expertise consulting widely across research agencies to evaluate methods and modes of research.

Specialties:
Building positive client relationships | Leading and supervising research projects | Strong capabilities in survey techniques and applied research methods | Knowledge of market research tools, methodologies, and suppliers | Analyzing and interpreting data to provide insights for business users across the organization | Ability to see the whole picture, connect the dots and solve problems | Synthesizing information to craft strategic recommendation and convey these to clients | Identifying what consumer research (qual & quant) is needed to deliver project objectives | Collaborating with senior managers and decision makers to identify and solve problems | Bringing data and insights to strategic decisions | Driving NPS & customer satisfaction programs | Identifying research priorities and needs | Supporting processes using primary and secondary research | Experience with SPSS and Stata | Collaborating with cross-functional teams to understand research needs | Communicating trends, highlights and shortcomings based on data | Communicating effectively with decision-makers and non-specialists | Developing ideas and contributing to the customer experience | Delivering results in improving customer satisfaction and profit

profile_positions.description:
Managing the Generation and Gender Survey (covering family composition, dynamics, and roles). Collaborating with clients globally across all 18 countries for methodological alignment. Personally managing fieldwork and client relations in 6 countries (Uruguay, Argentina, Norway, Finland, Estonia, and the Czech Republic). 
• Negotiated participation in the project by partners in Argentina and Uruguay. 
• Improved on the previous round of research by centralising globally.  
• Created a global method of weighting results to account for unequal representation of groups in the population.
• Designed the method of fieldwork reporting daily for clients across the countries.  
• Oversaw fieldwork by some of the largest research agencies and collaborated on e.g. increasing response rates.
profile_positions.title: Research Operations Manager / Research Methodologist

profile_positions.description: Performed Customer Due Diligence / Know Your Customer checks to ensure that financial institutions’ customers are properly risk assessed before being onboarded.
profile_positions.title: CDD Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Successfully applied for a grant of €100k from the Polish science ministry. Designed a two-year project investigating company in-house research methodology, professional standards, and common problems. Managed a €100k budget.
• Secured participation of more than 50 B2B insight executives from 13 EU countries in 1-hour in-depth interviews.
• Concluded that there was a mismatch in expectations between clients and agencies regarding the ability of agencies to interpret research and translate it into actionable insights. Suggested a solution involving collaboration with in-house researchers to better understand the business and industry context.
• Published a paper for the Quantitative User Experience Conference Proceedings about the extent of consideration given to respondent UX. Considered issues of question complexity and answer validity. Identified the need for greater methodological awareness amongst marketers.
profile_positions.title: Postdoctoral Visiting Researcher

company.name: University of Lodz (Faculty of Economics and Sociology)

profile_positions.description:
Taught quantitative and qualitative research methods, project management, and technical skills such as research analytics using SPSS. Acted as a fieldwork manager and interviewer. Provided methodological guidance and coaching.
•	Ran a course for business people in non-research roles to upskill in professional research. Delivered to two cohorts of 20 delegates.
•	Received excellent student evaluation scores. 
•	Assessed innovative survey delivery methods to make the experience more human such as featuring a photo or avatar of the interviewer. Demonstrated that this improved both engagement and data quality. 
•	Oversaw the completion of 20+ quantitative and qualitative student research projects.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Professor

profile_positions.description:
Taught quantitative and qualitative research methods, project management, and technical skills such as research analytics using SPSS. Completed PhD and collaborated with academic colleagues and research agencies on other research. Acted as a fieldwork manager and interviewer. Provided methodological guidance and coaching.
• Ran a course for business people in non-research roles to upskill in professional research. Delivered to two cohorts of 20 delegates.
• Received excellent student evaluation scores. 
• Completed a survey of 50 members of parliament and 10 in-depth interviews with journalists about lobbying.
• Oversaw the completion of 80+ quantitative and qualitative student research projects.
profile_positions.title: Research & Teaching Fellow

company.name: Kantar MillwardBrown / TNS / QAH Pharmamarketing 360° / Public Opinion Research Center

profile_positions.company: Kantar MillwardBrown / TNS / QAH Pharmamarketing 360° / Public Opinion Research Center
profile_positions.description:
Worked for several major market research organisations, consulted clients, and designed the research concept for projects. Managed or delivered fieldwork, developed questionnaires, analysed and visualized data, and presented and reported to clients. Managed fieldwork staff (15+ interviewers).
• Developed and managed 25+ research projects, assisting clients from healthcare, pharmaceutical, FMCG, construction, government, and non-profit sectors. Conducted many types of face-to-face interviews. 
• Evaluated the market and stakeholder attitudes towards a tiling product. Carried out secondary (desk) research, competitor analysis, and market share definition. Surveyed 300 architects and property developers, plus in-depth interviews and focus groups. Ran a product trial with construction companies. Demonstrated demand, informed marketing strategy, and identified both product and information manual improvements. 
• Supported a pharmaceutical company to launch a new product after clinical trials. Designed research with doctors being interviewed about patient diary feedback. Evaluated attitudes to prescribing and using the drug. 
• Designed a test for an agency to evaluate interviewer knowledge. Identified a training need regarding survey and sampling fundamentals.
profile_positions.title: Interviewer / Fieldwork Manager / Researcher / Analyst

profile_positions.description: Taught quantitative and qualitative research methods, project management, and technical skills such as research analytics using SPSS.
profile_positions.title: Teaching Fellow
